name: Celestial Infusion (Red)
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. Infuses character with a cosmic aura.

name: Elonian Cutlass Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword.

name: Elonian Greatblade Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other greatsword.

name: Mini Rogue Balthazar
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Sunspear Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Elonian Rod Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other scepter.

name: Elonian Sidearm Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other pistol.

name: Elonian Pocketbow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other short bow.

name: Elonian Firelight Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other torch.

name: Elonian Thrasher Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other mace.

name: Invitation to "Lily of the Elon"
description:
Located in the Crystal Oasis.
• Crafting Stations
• Bank and Guild-Bank Access
• Mystic Forge
• Merchants
<c=@Flavor>A handwritten invitation to "Elona's most luxurious retreat," the Lily of the Elon.</c>

name: Elonian Runestone Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other focus.

name: The Spearmarshal's Gift
description:
Open to choose a new weapon skin to unlock for your account.
<c=@Flavor>A gift from an unknown friend across the seas, in hopes that you will be a useful ally.</c>

name: Elonian Warsickle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other axe.

name: Elonian Recurve Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow.

name: Elonian Smasher Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other hammer.

name: Elonian Standard Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other staff.

name: Elonian Carver Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.

name: Elonian Wallshield Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Elonian Horn Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other warhorn.

name: Elonian Matchlock Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Wish for Unity
description: Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.

name: Skimmer Treat from Ghada
description: A tasty treat for your skimmer.

name: Confidential Forgotten Letter
description:
A secret letter for Aisha Jedgok, who is undercover among the ghosts of the Lair of the Forgotten.

Double-click to locate.

name: Chest of the Desert Highlands Hero
description: Double-click to open. Contains 1 Sip of Liquid Karma, 10 Trade Contracts, and 1 Scrap of Desert Mastery (Autoconsume).

name: Recipe: Mordant Infantry Bow
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Infantry Bow recipe.

name: Elonian Rod
description: An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Threat: Lord Hanif
description:
Double-click to gain a large amount of bonus Mastery experience.
<c=@Flavor>Help Amnoon earn the favor of Joko's armies by taking out notable threats.</c>

name: Dragon Card
description: <c=@flavor>This card symbolizes power—destructive, corrupting, elusive, and yet everywhere.</c>

name: Knight's Winged Boots of the Mesmer
Warbeast Gossamer Helm Strap
description: Used to craft Gossamer Helms.

name: Soldier's Tempered Scale Legs of the Warrior
Warbeast Hardened Boot Sole
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Boots.

name: Recipe: Mordant Edge
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Edge recipe.

name: Cleric's Tempered Scale Gauntlets of the Guardian
Shadi's Reward
description: A reward for finding all of Shadi's missing Sunspear equipment.

name: Guardian Hydra Statue
description: This item only has value when part of a collection.

name: Caustic Cuisses of the Cavalier
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Intelligence Report: Palawa Joko I Page 03
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Book of Vlast Page 03
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Mini Awakened Death Seer
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Raptor Treat
description:
Double-click to feed this to your raptor, who is sure to enjoy this meaty treat.

Gives bonus Mastery experience once per day.

name: Black Lion Instant Level 80 Ticket
description: The use of this ticket grants a new Instant 80 item. This ticket requires an empty Shared Inventory Slot to use.

name: Trophy of the Champion Scourge
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Soldier's Green Wood Harpoon Gun of Energy
Writings of the Last Spearmarshal, Vol. 6
Ancient Family Crest
description:
Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Recover this to help ensure the noble families of Elona will support Amnoon in the coming war.</c>

name: Dwarven Hammer Pommel
description: A broken piece of a dwarven war hammer.

name: Round Elonian Windmill
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Dwarven Shield Half Set of Spikes
description: A broken piece of a dwarven shield.

name: Rampager's Green Wood Harpoon Gun of Earth
Confidential Bonestrand Letter
description:
A secret letter for Nori Mahat, who is currently undercover in the village of Purity among local villagers.

Double-click to locate.

name: Tiara of the Temple Guard of the Cavalier
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Threat Report: Ecological Disruption
description: Double-click to gain a large amount of Mastery experience.

name: Recipe: Mordant Sickle
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Sickle recipe.

name: Marshal's Elonian Leggings
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Riddle of the Mirage
description: <c=@Flavor>Nothing is more desirable than what you do not have.</c>

name: Letter from Unja
description: A letter from Unja asking you to visit her at the springer stable at Highjump Ranch.

name: Suspicious Order
description: Vizier's order to sabotage the village of Purity in the Desolation's Bonestrand area. Give this to Kisha Odili or Tariq Ayim.

name: Chest of the Crystal Desert Hero
description: Double-click to open. Contains 1 Sip of Liquid Karma, 10 Trade Contracts, and 1 Scrap of Desert Mastery (Autoconsume).

name: Chest of the Final Room
description: Double-click to open.

name: Warbeast Hardened Trouser Padding
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Leggings.

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Breastplate
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Breastplate recipe.

name: Writings of the Last Spearmarshal, Vol. 1
Dispatch Page 03
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Order of Shadows Jackal Treat
description: A tasty treat for your jackal.

name: Writings of the Last Spearmarshal, Vol. 8
House of Daoud Cloth Crate
description:
Can contain gossamer and silk scraps.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Brightwater Supply Crate
description: A crate of supplies that should be taken to Ket'abatchk at Brightwater Inlet.

name: Trader's Key
description: Double-click to add a Trader's Key to your wallet.

name: Wish for Harmony
description: Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.

name: Springer
description: Activate this to unlock your mount and the associated Mastery track.

name: 24-Slot Marshal's Saddlebag
description: 24 slots. Weapons and armor will fill this box before other empty spaces. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list.

name: Trophy of the Champion Holosmith
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Royal Funerary Boot Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Attuned Dunkoro's Treasure
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Assassin's Green Wood Harpoon Gun of Rage
Soldier's Tempered Scale Chestplate of the Warrior
Well-Cut Jib
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The flag of Amnoon pays homage to its naval history.</c>

name: Dwarven Axe Pommel
description: A broken piece of a dwarven axe.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Horn
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear horn recipe.

name: Page of Spearmarshal Helm Recipes
description:
Double-click to pick a recipe for Spearmarshal Helms. Can be learned by armorsmiths, leatherworkers, and tailors.

Purchase these recipes from renown merchants in Elona after learning the base recipes from the story.

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Greaves
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Greaves recipe.

name: Cleric's Tempered Scale Greaves of the Guardian
Primordus Dye Kit
description: Double-click to choose an account-bound, exclusive dye from this pack.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Recurve
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear recurve recipe.

name: Warbeast Hardened Glove Panel
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Gloves.

name: Letter from Drojkor
description: A letter from Drojkor asking you to come see him back at the Djinn Enclave.

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Helmet
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Helmet recipe.

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Pauldrons
description: A recipe to make Spearmarshal's Pauldrons.

name: Dwarven Shield Half Set of Spikes
description: A broken piece of a dwarven shield.

name: Wish for Progress
description: Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.

name: Raptor Treat from Mayor Kabir
description: A tasty treat for your raptor.

name: Hatched Batten
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The flag of Amnoon pays homage to its naval history.</c>

name: Mini Herald
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Luminous Arc
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow.

name: Elonian Railing
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Mini Rock Lion
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Soldier's Tempered Scale Gauntlets of the Warrior
Bag of Skimmer Fertilizer
description: <c=@Flavor>Rare to find and often viewed as cheating, but the food produced with this is known to be highly nutritious and valuable.</c>

name: Luminous Caliber
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Branded Crystal
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Assassin's Rascal Mask of the Ranger
Forgotten Talon
description:
Grants a small amount of karma.

<c=@Flavor>These claws are still sharp enough to be used as rock-carving tools—or for self-defense, in a bind. </c>

name: Writings of the Last Spearmarshal, Vol. 5
Magnificent Brace
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The Sunspear banner remains a symbol of heroism and unity.</c>

name: Warmed Coastal Griffon Egg
description:
Collect this and return it to the Sanctuary.

Collecting this will also provide bonus desert Mastery experience.

name: Solar and Lunar Dye Kit
description: Double-click to choose an account-bound, exclusive dye from this pack.

name: Rabid Tempered Scale Gauntlets of the Revenant
Blessing of Loyalty
description: Double-click to gain a reward.

name: Mini Sunspear Abasi
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Warbeast Gossamer Coat Panel
description: Used to craft gossamer coats.

name: Dwarven Staff Shaft
description: A broken piece of a dwarven staff.

name: Warbeast Gossamer Epaulet Panel
description: Used to craft Gossamer Shoulders.

name: The Legacy Page 05
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Dwarven Staff Rune
description: A broken piece of a dwarven staff.

name: Luminous Ward
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Warmarshal's Tribute
description: Double-click to open.

name: Mini Zalambur
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Tattered Scroll
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.

<c=@Flavor>Whatever wisdom or desperate pleas this once held have been erased by sand, time, and war.</c>

name: Cook Rehman's Famous Raptor Treat
description: A tasty treat for your raptor.

name: Mini Iboga
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Gift of Competitive Prowess
description: In the Mystic Forge, combine a Gift of Competitive Prosperity, Gift of Competitive Prowess, Gift of Competitive Dedication, and a PvP Ascended Armor piece to upgrade the armor to Legendary.

name: Play Script
description:
A script for a play written by celebrated director Abioye Bayu of the Lyssan Fools acting troupe. The Greatest Love Story Ever Told...about a Mime
Renown Item

name: Recipe: Bowl of "Elon Red"
description: Recipe Unlock: Double-click to unlock the Chef recipe for Bowl of "Elon Red."

name: Chest of the Bounty Hunter's Breeches
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Imperial Guard Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Elonian Boot Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Recipe: Brandspark Jewel
description: A recipe to make a Brandspark Jewel, used in Elonian jewelcrafting.

name: Spite-Fueled Spaulder of the Cavalier
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Dispatch Page 02
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Boots
description: A recipe to make Spearmarshal's Boots.

name: Sigil of the Fool (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Zunja's Necklace
description: A woman's name is engraved on the back of the pendant.

name: Elonian Visitor's Gift
description: Double-click to open.

name: Diviner's Reach Supply Case
description: A crate of supplies that should be taken to Ouna in Diviner's Reach.

name: Shadi's Helm
description: Shadi's missing helm.

name: Warbeast Gossamer Pant Panel
description: Used to craft Gossamer Leggings.

name: Warbeast Gossamer Glove Panel
description: Used to craft Gossamer Gloves.
